casebody.data:
STATE
v.
CAPLES and Mitchell. No. 512P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 13, 2005. Jonathan P. Babb, Special Deputy Attorney General, Robert F. Johnson, District Attorney, for State of NC. M. Alexander Charns, Durham, for Brandon M. Caples. Paul Pooley, for Christopher G. Mitchell.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th day of September *5322005 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 13th day of September 2005."
